[ library(repair) | The ECLiPSe Libraries | Reference Manual | Alphabetic Index ]

?Vars tent_get ?Values

Query the tentative values of variables in Vars.
Vars
Term typically with variables with tentative values
Values
Term to receive tentative values of Vars.

Description

Values is a copy of the term Vars with the tentative values filled in place of the variables. If a variable has no tentative value a variable is returned in its place.

CAUTION: If a variable has no tentative value, it is not possible to give it a tentative value by binding that returned variable. tent_set/2 must be used instead.

Fail Conditions

Values does not unify with Vars with the tentative values filled in.

Resatisfiable

no

See Also

tent_set / 2
